website_summaries.verdict: A 21x zoom and a wealth of shooting options and wireless features make the Samsung WB800F Smart Camera a fine smartphone accessory.
pros: The Samsung WB800F Smart Camera has excellent wireless features and an abundance of shooting options for all types of shooters
It has a handy pop-up flash and very good photo and video quality for its price and features
cons: Button placement on top of the camera could be better, and accessing some of the setting menus isn't always straightforward
Photo quality is merely OK above ISO 400

customer_reviews.title: Great zooming capabilities and very vivid photos, quality camera and a must have
customer_reviews.text: I love my new camera! The zooming capabilities a much better then I expected I work for a travel company and I have brought this on all of my trips. While everyone else is using their cellphones for photos this has capabilities that a phone does not. The videos are quality, the photos are vivid . This carmera is a must have and I am thoroughly impressed by this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lutkins

customer_reviews.title: great clarity and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for work use. We especially like the WIFI and ability to send photos directly to customer's emails, phones, etc. Haven't figured out how to save often used addresses - hope it's in there, but if not that would be a downfall. Otherwise takes good clear photos and is easy to use. Wouldn't be without the touch screen for sending photos.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Tri Cia

customer_reviews.title: unable to charge because of damaged connector
customer_reviews.text: not happy with camera and had to order an external battery charger as workaround
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, fair value.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, easy to use. We were especially impressed with the WiFi capability. If you remember what a dictionary looks like, picture that when you print off the owner/instruction manual at over 100 pages and a lot of pictures. Maybe a little better design of the manual would save a tree or two.
customer_reviews.author: pmanning

customer_reviews.title: It's a great little camera - it takes great pictures and is ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little camera to take with me to Europe. It's a great little camera - it takes great pictures and is small and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Robin G

customer_reviews.title: Samsung WB800F 16.3MP CMOS Smart WiFi Digital Camera with 21x Optical Zoom,...
customer_reviews.text: I love this Samsung camera with WiFi it easy to transfer image to the computer. I love this camera because it newer and more option to use. I will recommend to my friends and my family and I will buy 1 more but I will wait for on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I have found this camera very easy to use and it takes very good picture. The zoom feature is very good. My wife likes to put pictures on her facebook page and this camera makes it possible to put them on he page with Wi-Fi.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bellman

customer_reviews.title: Tiny camera, fast recycle, network connection
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent camera for the price. Small enough to fit in a pocket, good zoom, quick recycle, and automatic uploads to your home network (or wherever you choose). I bought it as a gift. The recipient is thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: P. Henaghan

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Defenitely a camera you would buy for your kids, clarity is meh, but features are so awesome it will drive you insane to know there are so many features!
customer_reviews.author: Prad..The Gadget Man

customer_reviews.title: great camera and great price
customer_reviews.text: My only compaint is that this camera does not have an eyepiece for viewing. You have to use the screen when pointing and shooting. The screen is highly reflective, making it difficult to see what you are taking pictures of. In whole, it is a great camera with more than enough features. The zoom with image stabilization is another great feature. I bought 2 Samsungs from Amazon shortly before the Black Friday sales. It would have been nice to get them at the cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are incorrect
customer_reviews.text: A great camera but don't bother trying to connect to wifi with the published proceedure. Call Tech support for instructions. The user guide on web is also wrong. The feature works well but getting it started is a mystery
customer_reviews.author: M. rubin

customer_reviews.title: great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Easy to use and fun to play around with the filters. Love being able to send the pics from my camera to my phone for sharing or straight to my Facebook
customer_reviews.author: Darkfaery7734

customer_reviews.title: Camera is terrific. Video quality is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Camera is terrific. Video quality is excellent. Many great features, just wish Samsung included a user manual.
customer_reviews.author: David F. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: OP MANUAL IN GERMAN AND SPANISH, NOT HELPFUL! CAMERA WORKS FINE IF I CAN FIGURE IT OUT, GETTING BABY HELP
customer_reviews.author: pinbo

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a few times, but so far I love it. It is small enough to carry around and it takes great shots. My favorite feature is that you can take pictures while shooting a movie! You will want to purchase an extra battery.
customer_reviews.author: Jan K Thompson

customer_reviews.title: The instruction manual assumes a great deal of knowledge on the part of the buyer!
customer_reviews.text: I am certain that it is an excellent camera, but the "getting started" directions leave a lot to be desired. I downloaded the full instruction manual and even that is difficult for me to comprehend. I am not exactly stupid (I have a Phd in biology), but I am 80 years old. While the camera is a smart WiFi digital camera, I guess I am not smart amout modern electronics and apparently I am not going to learn from the manual. I shall use it and I expect to get good results. Unfortunately, I'll be using only about 10% of the camera's capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Hewitson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: outstanding......very ez to operate well worth the money wish i had bought two
customer_reviews.author: al granger

customer_reviews.title: Camera does take good photos, problem is now the camera us useless ...
customer_reviews.text: Camera does take good photos, problem is now the camera us useless - it lasted one trip and broke.
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Lefebvre

customer_reviews.title: great product and value!
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this so far. excellent features--smart mode, best face, wi-fi, and whole bunch more. experimenting with it and will be taking it traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Van C. Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love the zoom ability and all the settings for pictures and videos. Great photos and easy to use. The touchscreen option is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Newton

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR ME
customer_reviews.text: PICTURE QUALITY SO POOR THAT I RETURNED IT! I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS CAMERA. ALL PICTURES TAKEN WERE FUZZY. I EVEN HAD OTHERS TRY IT.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Brent

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my photo needs
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great for a casual photographer like me. I am not a professional photographer, and do not expect this camera to compete with the highest-end models. But, for the price and with the great zoom, it is exactly the camera I need.
customer_reviews.author: rchkr

customer_reviews.title: This camera has been a great camera, up until the LCD display failed at ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera has been a great camera, up until the LCD display failed at 14 months (just after the warranty expired, of course), and we are now looking at a very inconvenient (and most likely very expensive) repair. According to Samsung, our nearest repair depot is about 1100 kilometers away (should they bother to answer their phone).
customer_reviews.author: featherlou

product_meta.title: Samsung WB800F 16.3MP CMOS Smart WiFi Digital Camera with 21x Optical Zoom, 3.0" Touch Screen LCD and 1080p HD Video (Black)
product_meta.description:
The Samsung WB800F Smart Camera is packed with an arsenal of Samsung's technologies so you can take shots in a variety of situations. A 16.3-megapixel backside-illuminated sensor gives you incredible clarity and detail even in low-light situations, and built-in Wi-Fi means you'll be able to share your images quickly and easily.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


The Samsung WB800F Smart Camera is packed with an arsenal of Samsung's technologies so you can take shots in a variety of situations. A 16.3-megapixel backside-illuminated sensor gives you incredible clarity and detail even in low-light situations, and built-in Wi-Fi means you'll be able to share your images quickly and easily.

The 16.3-megapixel BSI sensor is optimal for low-light performance. View larger.

A brilliant 3-inch touch display features easy navigation. View larger.

16.3-MEGAPIXEL BACKSIDE-ILLUMINATED CMOS SENSOR
The WB800F is equipped with a 16.3-megapixel backside-illuminated (BSI) CMOS sensor that needs less light for proper exposure and quicker focus than conventional sensors. This allows you to take properly exposed shots in low-light situations. With the Low Light Shot feature, the camera will automatically merge three continuous shots into one clear, bright photo with little blur and noise, whether you took it candlelight, moonlight, or practically no light at all.

TELEPHOTO LENS WITH 21X ZOOM CAPABILITY
The WB800F has a 21x zoom lens that gives you a large range to work with, letting you easily frame the shot you want. The lens starts at a wide 35mm-equivalent focal length of 23mm and zooms in to 483mm for close-ups. The sharp lens combined with the high-resolution sensor means you'll have crisp shots you can use to make large prints.

HYBRID TOUCH DISPLAY GIVES YOU OPTIONS
Samsung equipped the WB800F with a brilliant, 3-inch display that lets you compose and review your photos comfortably and accurately. The display has hybrid user interface that lets you use either the five-way button for menu navigation if you prefer traditional controls or your fingers if you prefer touch controls. Either way, the intuitive navigation makes setting controls and sharing images a snap.

FULL HD VIDEO RECORDING
The WB800F lets you take incredible 1,080p full HD videos in addition to photos. The camera shoots video in the H.264 format, which allows you to record for longer than cameras using MJPEG video.

WI-FI CONNECTIVITY FOR EASY SHARING AND FACEBOOK UPLOAD
Thanks to built-in Wi-Fi, transferring your images and sharing them no longer requires memory cards or cables. You won't have to worry about running out of space, either.

With the dedicated Direct Link hot key, you can quickly connect to Wi-Fi networks. Once connected, you can save photos and videos directly to a computer or cloud service as you shoot. Print photos wirelessly or share them with your friends instantly by uploading them straight to Facebook or YouTube. With dual band Wi-Fi support, you'll have faster and more stable connections to the wireless networks around you.

CONNECT TO YOUR SMARTPHONE FOR MORE FEATURES
The WB800F works with Samsung's Smart Camera App (for iPhone and Android), which lets you instantly pair your camera with your smartphone and gives you features such as AutoShare and Remote ViewFinder.

When AutoShare is activated, all the pictures you take on your camera are automatically sent to your smartphone. Remote ViewFinder turns your phone into a viewfinder and lets you preview images, adjust camera settings, frame the scene, and tag the shot location from up to 30 feet away. When you need to take a group shot with yourself in it, Remote ViewFinder makes it easy.

CLOUD SERVICE BACKUP WITH MICROSOFT SKYDRIVE
Never worry about losing your photos, even if your camera is lost or stolen. If your camera is connected to Wi-Fi, the WB800F will copy the images you take to a Microsoft SkyDrive account. This feature not only automatically backs up all your photos, but also lets you easily make more room on your memory card by deleting shots without fear you'll lose them.

SMART MODE FOR SPECIAL EFFECTS
Tap the smart mode button to take advantage of numerous special shoot modes. Action Freeze mode lets you capture a high-speed scene, such as in sports, while Fireworks mode is perfect for the Fourth of July. Use Light Trace mode to capture perfect trails of light at night on a busy intersection full of red taillights.

PRODUCT DIMENSIONS AND WEIGHT
The WB800F measures 2.56 by 4.35 by 0.85 inches (H x W x D) and weighs 0.48 pounds.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
WB800F Smart Camera, Li-Ion battery (SLB-10A), USB charging cable, wrist strap, start-up guide, and warranty card.

WB800 SMART CAMERA
COBALT BLACK
AT A GLANCE:
 * 16.3-megapixel BSI sensor for optimal low-light performance
 * 21x zoom lens provides versatile range
 * 3-inch hybrid touch display with easy navigation
 * Built-in Wi-Fi for easy sharing and data transfers
 * Captures Full HD Video

Select your shooting mode with the rotator dial. View larger.

Automatically send photos to your smartphone with AutoShare. View larger.
feature_bullets: SMART features - Social Media Upload, E-mail, Direct Link, Mobile Link, PC Auto-backup, Remote Viewfinder, All share, Cloud Service
